forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 15C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 58F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 62F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High around 60F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
